name: Sevalaya
briefDescription: The activities of Sevalaya include 1. TN Govt recognised, unaided, Tamil Medium free Higher Secondary school providing free education to 2000 rural poor students 2. Free community college offering vocational courses in five trades like AC Tech, Electrician, Computers, Beautician and Nursing Asst., for rural poor youth including those who have not had formal education.3. Home for destitute and orphaned children, 150 nos. and destitute and poor senior citizens nos. 704. Goshala sheltering about 60 destitute, dry cows5. Organic farming, vermicompost, bio gas production6. Medical centre offering free medication and treatment for rural poor6. Rural development projects including free medical camps in surrounding 40 villages, free training in tailoring for rural poor women at 2 centres in Mambakkam and Vadanallur6. Free computer class for poor rural youth at 2 centres in Mambakkam and Vadanallur
